meanings.definition: A person who receives a gift of real property through a will.
meanings.sent1: The devisees were thrilled to inherit the old family farmhouse.
meanings.sent2: The lawyer informed the devisees about their inheritance.
meanings.sent3: The devisees joked about becoming unexpected landowners.
meanings.sent4: The devisees were like treasure hunters discovering their bounty.
meanings.sent5: The devisees eagerly awaited news of their bequest.

meanings.sent1: The devisees gathered to discuss the terms of the will.
meanings.sent2: The judge confirmed the identities of the devisees.
meanings.sent3: The devisees formed a club for those who had inherited property.
meanings.sent4: The devisees stood out as the rightful heirs among the relatives.
meanings.sent5: The devisees celebrated their shared ownership of the estate.
